text1: Downgrading the flux core that makes the Brawler so potent might seem like a strange choice, but the volume of missile firepower that can be deployed by this modified variant more than makes up for the loss of direct fire capability.

Outfitting the Vigilance has often been seen as something of an awkward proposition, but this InReCo conversion aims to resolve that issue. Improved defenses and a cluster flak array mean that weapons can be dedicated solely to offense without running into concerns with how the craft can deal with missiles and fighters.

The Centurion is a dependable frigate that is able to survive far more punishment than most other ships of its size and this InReCo conversion seeks to go beyond that. An upgraded flux core, superior weapon mounts and concussion pulse vanes mean that this ship can not only take damage, but dish it out as well.

An extensive refit of the Cerberus, a large portion of the storage space has been replaced with an autoforge and the attendant launch mechanisms that allow deployment of Lacayo drones. While no-longer able to offer any real logistical support this ship is now able to act as an effective drone support platform for smaller fleets.

This InReCo conversion is a textboox example of their doctrine, while it retains a largely energy focused armament. The addition of a significant amount of missile firepower alongside the single ballistic mount shifts the nature of the immediate threat posed by the ship, but it remains largely unchanged in overall role, remaining something of a glass cannon.

Highly modified from the standard Enforcer hull, this ship can field a dizzying array of missiles, and when combined with a generous cluster flak array it can prove a solid anchor for smaller fleets. While in larger engagements it can act as a dependable and survivable support and escort craft.

InReCo converted this Drover to be able to be more capable as a front line combatant, improved defenses and flux systems mean that it can survive better than the standard Drover. Despite the upgrades this ship still remains inferior to a dedicated combat craft, and relies  more on the strategic advantage that it can offer with a mix of missiles, fighters and a Lacayo drone.

Only recently being pushed into production this conversion suprised many in how quickly it was developed by InReCo. The external weapons configuration has seen some notable changes, though internal modifications are suprisingly minor and nearly all of the core hulll framework remains untouched.

Converted to act as a carrier, this Venture modification is far more combat capable than the original craft, but some armour and a significant portion of the cargo holds had to be sacrificed to achieve these changes. The combination of the upgrade from a drone forge to true flight decks and the systems to launch Lacayo drones mean that it can offer impressive fleet support for its size.

Despite an upgraded flux grid, this Dominator conversion can struggle to sustain the flux load of all of the many weapon mounts that it features, but nonetheless it is more than capable of acting as a solid defensive bulwark around which the rest of a fleet can operate.

The addition of concussion pulse vanes linked to a high throughput energy focus system give a notable boost to the firepower of this InReCo conversion of the Falcon. Despite the added mass  from the wide range of modifications  that have been applied, improvements to the already impressive engines allow this ship to maintain the speed and mobility distinctive to the Falcon.

All but completely turning the design prinicples of the Conquest on their head, this redesign sacrifices a large portion of its direct firepower in order to field a respectable carrier and drone complement.

The removal of the "Orion Drive" system comes to the relief of crews, and while the reduction in explosive mobility leaves this converted Retribution less able to employ hyper-aggressive tactics, improved flux and defensive systems allow it to act as a more "traditional" battlecruiser quite effectively.

This retrofit of the Pegasus offers a significant improvement in defensive capabilities, but the overall reduction in mount sizes requires a careful consideration of  installed weaponry to prevent a loss in effective damage output.

Initially developed as a demonstration testbed platform for various advanced technologies, due to the success of the constituent technologies the Zumbido was further refined and ended up being finalised into its current form.

Following the success of the Zumbido a heavier vessel taking full advantage of the developed technologies was produced, the resulting combination of focused frontal firepower and superior mobility make the Trastorno a true hunter-killer.

Designed to exploit the full advantages of cutting-edge InReCo technology, which combined with a focus on frontal firepower allows the Estrondo to easily 'punch up' and deliver serious damage to exposed targets.

A cheap and disposable interceptor drone, able to swarm and overwhelm most hostile fighter wings with a volley of Flash Bolter fire. Organised resistance proves to be a significant threat though, as they will rapidly fail under any amount of focused point-defense fire.
A basic drone platform mounting a Millstone cannon. While somewhat underwhelming in firepower it provides a cheap and consistent source of fire support.
A basic drone platform mounting a Flock MRM. Contributes effectively to an overall strategem of missile saturation.

This design that was derived from the Broadsword, the Espada makes great sacrifices in anti-ship firepower in order to make an attempt at all but completely occupying the attention of hostile point defense gunners.

Heavyweight and heavily armed, the Javali carries a powerful general purpose punch in the form of a Quark Bolter. Despite its impressive firepower and durability the fact that there are only two craft in a wing can lead to it struggling against more well defended targets.
Packed full of InReCo Concussion technology, while the damage output of the Empacho is rather low it offers effective support fire that can disrupt hostile combat performance.
An autonomous combat drone, outfitted with a Spark Bolter the standard Lacayo is largely useful as a distraction but can offer some point defense utility.
An autonomous combat drone, outfitted with a Fusion Bolter the assault Lacayo is able to tear through armour.
An autonomous combat drone, outfitted with a Gluon Bolter the support Lacayo is oriented for providing pressure onto its target, but lacks in killing potential.
A simple drone that is little more than an engine and a Pulse Bolter.
A simple drone that is little more than an engine and a Pulse Bolter, this lightweight variant has had all but the most essential protection removed.
A standard burst fire energy bolt weapon, mostly unremarkable but with the saving grace of an efficient flux profile.
A heavier mount of a rather standard burst fire energy bolt weapon, mostly unremarkable but with the saving grace of an efficient flux profile.
Fires a burst of volatile energy bolts that scatter over a wide area.
Fires a large burst of volatile energy bolts that scatter and saturate a wide area.
Burst fire missile defense weapon, with highly respectable range and projectile velocity.
An upsized burst fire missile defense weapon, a rapid cycle rate compensates for the somehat anemic low density energy bolts it fires.
Projects a ragged spread of high temprature energy bolts that are highly effective at wearing down armour.
Fires a large burst of swarming energy bolts, offering somewhat inaccurate long range fire support at a flux premium.
A medium range ion weapon that delivers a temporary buildup of arcing disruptive energy that proves highly effective at disabling enemy systems and engines.
Delivers bursts of highly destructive charged energy bolts. While somewhat flux hungry it performs quite effectively against both shields and armour.
Long ranged and respectably flux efficient, this weapon offers a modest amount of firepower best suited to ships keeping to a restricted flux budget.

Fires bursts of high powered bolts that embed Quark Charges into their targets, the resonant nature of the charges means that it is best used en-masse or alongside other weapons that can deliver charges.

The resonant nature of Quark Charges leads to an inherent synergy across the various weapons that deliver and manipulate them, and mounting them in volume across a fleet can easily multiply their destructive potential.
A low output pulse weapon, it sacrifices damage output in order to emphasise mount flexibility and ease of installation.

High velocity explosive shells that embed a Quark Charge into the target, the internal magazine grants it the ability to deliver devastating bursts of damage that can tear through armoured targets.

The resonant nature of Quark Charges leads to an inherent synergy across the various weapons that deliver and manipulate them, and mounting them in volume across a fleet can easily multiply their destructive potential.
A simple and reliable two barreled cannon. While the mid-caliber fragmentation shells are somewhat lacking in damage output, the weapon has an easily manageable flux profile.
A simple and reliable three barreled cannon. While the mid-caliber fragmentation shells are somewhat lacking in damage output, the weapon has an easily manageable flux profile.
Two light railguns fused into a single weapons system, efficient and consistent, but surpassed in raw firepower by various other weapons.
A pair of fused railguns, just like the smaller model remains efficient, but retains the comparative lack of damage output.
A snub barreled cannon that fires canisters of high-density flechettes, able to overwhelm shield projectors in an instant, but has a rather short effective range.
A heavy cannon that loads advanced siege shells with incredible reach and power, able to provide punishing fire support at range.
A triplicate mounting of relativistic accelerators, offering solid overall performance that is only held back by rapid projectile destabilisation.

High caliber mortar that alongside a powerful explosive payload has the ability to agitate Quark Charges into early detonation.

The resonant nature of Quark Charges leads to an inherent synergy across the various weapons that deliver and manipulate them, and mounting them in volume across a fleet can easily multiply their destructive potential.
A basic lightweight missile. While lacking in speed and payload it has a respectable long-burn engine and integrates an autoloader allowing for sustained support fire.
A pod of basic lightweight missiles. While lacking in speed and payload it has a respectable long-burn engine and integrates an autoloader allowing for sustained support fire.
A launcher for cheap lightweight missiles, while lacking in payload the presence of an autoloader system means that they can be adequate at suppressing point defense if nothing else.
A twin tube launcher for cheap lightweight missiles, while lacking in payload the presence of an autoloader system means that they can be adequate at suppressing point defense if nothing else.
An armoured missile that is unusual in that rather than directly dealing damage it saturates hostile point defenses by launching a massed volume of flares.

An armoured chassis propelled by a powerful single-stage solid fuel engine. While the engine gives it the velocity to deal significant damage to shielding, maneuverability unfortunately suffers in exchange.
A launch rail system for lightweight drones. While the drones are very fragile and rather lightly armed, they can pose a suprisingly significant threat to targets that lack adequate point defense.

A Blister micromissile carrier that deploys a barrage of munitions on nearing its target. This blisters submunitions are loaded with a kinetic payload making it effective against shielding but lackluster otherwise.

A pod of Blister micromissile carriers that each deploy a barrage of munitions on nearing their target. These blisters submunitions are loaded with a kinetic payload making them effective against shielding but lackluster otherwise.

A Blister micromissile carrier that deploys a barrage of munitions on nearing its target. This blisters submunitions are loaded with a light shaped charge payload allowing them to tear through large volumes of armour with ease.

A pod of Blister micromissile carriers that each deploy a barrage of munitions on nearing their target. These blisters submunitions are loaded with a light shaped charge payload allowing them to tear through large volumes of armour with ease.
A launcher for high-yield armoured missiles, an effective anti-armour strike package with a respectable ammunition reserve.

Multi-stage long range missiles that release four anti-armour seekers on nearing a target, the ability to deliver Quark Charges at long range proves a valuable asset in fleet support.

The resonant nature of Quark Charges leads to an inherent synergy across the various weapons that deliver and manipulate them, and mounting them in volume across a fleet can easily multiply their destructive potential.

A standard burst fire energy bolt weapon, mostly unremarkable but with the saving grace of an efficient flux profile. This variant is mounted on an expendable drone powered by a limited capacitor, and as such has a limited number of shots it can fire.

A standard burst fire energy bolt weapon, mostly unremarkable but with the saving grace of an efficient flux profile. This variant is mounted on a drone without a full-sized power core, and as such has a limited number of shots it can fire.

Projects a ragged spread of high temprature energy bolts that are highly effective at wearing down armour. This variant is mounted on a drone without a full-sized power core, and as such has a limited number of shots it can fire.

Fires a large burst of swarming energy bolts, offering somewhat inaccurate long range fire support at a flux premium. This variant is mounted on a drone without a full-sized power core, and as such has a limited number of shots it can fire.
Fires a burst of volatile energy bolts that scatter over a wide area. This fighter mounted variant has a longer refire delay.
A simple and reliable cannon. While the mid-caliber fragmentation shells are somewhat lacking in damage output, it has very respectable range for a fighter mounted weapon.
A basic lightweight missile. While lacking in speed and payload it has a respectable long-burn engine and integrates an autoloader allowing for sustained support fire.
A launcher for cheap lightweight missiles, while lacking in payload the presence of an autoloader system means that they can be adequate at suppressing point defense if nothing else.
Integrated autoloading launch array loaded with advanced high velocity kinetic micromissiles.
Integrated autoloading launch array loaded with advanced high velocity kinetic micromissiles.

Integrated directly into the Empachos Concussion Vanes, this weapon delivers a concussive blast into targets that interferes with delicate machinery and stuns crews, while largely ineffective at dealing damage it is able to reduce the combat effectiveness of a target.
Feeding directly from the core of the Estrondo, this weapon combines flux management with direct offensive power.

Launch system for a heavy Blister micromissile carrier, the balanced but somewhat underwhelming performance of the submunitions allows them to act as a respectable complement to almost any weapons loadout, but lack the punch to act as an independent standout weapon.
Fires a large number of flak canisters with variable-timed proximity fuses all around the ship.
text3: Fires a large number of flak canisters with variable-timed proximity fuses all around the ship. Each canister deals 150 Fragmentation damage in an area and is targeted to avoid friendly fire.
text5: Each canister deals {{150 Fragmentation}} damage in an area and is targeted to avoid friendly fire.

text1: Engages extra thrusters to improve the ship's maneuverability. Also provides a moderate boost to the ship's top speed.
text3: Provides a brief boost to maneuverability and top speed.
text5: The ship's top speed is increased by {{60}}.

text1: Briefly activates an energy field and a concussive pulse generator, that mitigates incoming damage and repels nearby missiles at the cost of disabling weapons and shields.
text3: Briefly activates an energy field and a pulse generator, that mitigates incoming damage and repels nearby missiles at the cost of disabling weapons and shields.

text1: Deploys an independent Lacayo attack drone that will autonomously engage hostile targets.
text3: Deploys an independent Lacayo attack drone that will autonomously engage hostile targets.
text5: By default a Lacayo drone has {{600 Hull}}, {{150 Armor}} and is armed with a {{Spark Bolter}}.

text1: Launches flares that interfere with point-defenses.
text3: Launches flares that interfere with point-defenses.

text1: Disables weapons for a moment to engage a burst of rapid acceleration and increased top speed.
text3: Disables weapons for a moment to  engage a burst of rapid acceleration and increased top speed.
text5:
The ship's top speed is increased by  up to {{200}}. The ship also receives a significant boost to its turn and acceleration rates.

Reduces all damage taken by {{15%}}.

Time passes at up to {{60 percent}} faster than normal on board the ship.

Energy weapons recieve a significant boost to their reload speed during the boost, cutting around {{Three seconds}} from their reload time.

text1: Disables weapons for a moment to engage a short burst of rapid acceleration and increased top speed. The system stores multiple regenerating charges.
text3: Disables weapons for a moment to engage a short burst of rapid acceleration and increased top speed. The system stores multiple regenerating charges.
text5:
The ship's top speed is increased by  up to {{200}}. The ship also receives a significant boost to its turn and acceleration rates.

Reduces all damage taken by {{15%}}.

Time passes at up to {{60 percent}} faster than normal on board the ship.

Energy weapons recieve a significant boost to their reload speed during the boost, cutting around {{Four seconds}} from their reload time.

text1: Briefly increases the damage dealt by all energy weapons and activates a concussive pulse generator that repels nearby missiles. The capacitor array stores multiple charges, which are slowly regenerated.
text3: Briefly increases the damage dealt by all energy weapons and activates a concussive pulse generator that repels nearby missiles.
text5: The damage dealt by all energy weapons is increased by {{30%}}.
